trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.source: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.
trans-unit.target: 当问到那飞马如何在与腐沼小恶魔的遭遇战中存活下来时，只见它甩甩鬃毛，低声发出「噜噜」的嘶声。

trans-unit.target: 「将我们的旗帜挂在外墙上，士兵低声呼喊『他们来了』，我们坚固的城堡将嘲笑这卑鄙的攻击。」 ～威廉·莎士比亚，马克白

trans-unit.source: "And the flamingos said, 'Get out of our nest—we can't be seen with the likes of you!' So, the griffin ate them."\n—Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"
trans-unit.target: 「接著，火鹤便说：『离开我们的巢穴！我们可不能被看见和你在一起！』于是狮鹫就吃了它们。」 ～阿札渥雷，「丑陋的鸟」

trans-unit.target: 荣光充满了她且烁芒环绕著她。在神的祝福之下，一切都是可能的。

trans-unit.target: 依坎都狮鹫

trans-unit.source: "My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it."\n—Suq'Ata trader
trans-unit.target: 「有幸得以见到出猎的狮鹫滑翔而后攫取猎物，我被抓走的那头羊真地算是很便宜的代价。」 ～舒夸塔商人

trans-unit.source: Enlightened Tutor

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: 自你的牌库中搜寻一张神器或结界牌，并展示该张牌。将你的牌库洗牌，然后将该牌置于你的牌库顶上。

trans-unit.source: "I do not teach. I simply reveal."\n—Daudi, Femeref tutor
trans-unit.target: 「我从不教导，只是点悟。」 ～陶蒂，费米瑞甫导师

trans-unit.target: 「又是弓箭手、又是巨弩～你根本连接近阿维农岛的机会都没有。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.target: 「机会、宿命、命运、运气～这些不过是追求胜利，躲避失败的途径。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Icatian Town

trans-unit.source: Put four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 放置四个1/1，白色的市民衍生物进场。

trans-unit.source: Icatia's once-peaceful towns faced increasing attacks from orcs and goblins as the climate cooled. By the time the empire fell, they were little more than armed camps.
trans-unit.target: 随著气候变冷，一度平和的艾凯森诸镇面对越来越多来自半兽人和精灵的攻击。到了帝国沦陷时，所剩下的只能算是有武装的营地。

trans-unit.target: 「对士兵而言，战后苟活才是最大耻辱。」 ～泰林托

trans-unit.target: 你的对手所操控的神器、生物，和地须横置进场。

trans-unit.source: "Make people wait for what they want, and you have power over them. This is as true for merchants and militia as it is for cooks and couples."\n—Gwendlyn Di Corci
trans-unit.target: 「让人们等待他们所想要的，你对他们就有了操控力。」 ～温德琳·蒂·寇西

trans-unit.target: 光荣赴战，从容就义。 ～奇亚多朗皇家护卫座右铭

trans-unit.target: 「只要是长翅膀的，我都会把他钉在泰菲布鲁的天空上。」 ～赛费林弓箭手露亚

trans-unit.target: 飞行 o1oW：梅沙猎鹰得+0/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: A blazing light to drive out the shadows.
trans-unit.target: 那是驱除阴影的炽光。

trans-unit.target: 和平主义

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.source: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.
trans-unit.target: 在葛瑞克的一生中，这是他首次感到内心的温情与暖意。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 o1oW：珍珠龙得+0/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "They knew Bantau was lost when, to hide the pearl he had found on the beach, he swallowed it—and soon grew wings."\n—Hakim, Loreweaver
trans-unit.target: 「班滔为了掩饰他自海滩上找到的珍珠，便一口将它吞下，他们马上知道班滔已经没希望了～因为他很快便长出了翅膀。」 ～说书人哈金

trans-unit.source: Regal Unicorn
trans-unit.target: 帝王独角兽

trans-unit.source: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.
trans-unit.target: 「『你知道吗？我也一直认为独角兽是珍禽异兽耶！我从未在世上看过！』『那么，既然我们都见到彼此了，』独角兽说，『如果你相信我存在，我就相信你存在。』」 ～李维思·卡洛，爱莉丝镜中奇遇

trans-unit.source: Remedy

trans-unit.target: 对任何数量之目标生物和／或牌手，在本回合中防止接下来的5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"
trans-unit.target: 「在我远去时，它将随时保护著妳，并诉说我对妳的爱。」 ～昼与夜的恋曲

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标力量大于或等于4的生物。该生物不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."\n—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest
trans-unit.target: 「弱者将齐力抗敌，即使对手再强大，亦能克敌致胜。」 ～奇亚多朗祭司哈渥·阿雷森

trans-unit.target: 牺牲反抗军斗士：目标生物在此回合中不造成战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: "My soldiers fought without hesitation, died without doubt."\n—Sidar Jabari
trans-unit.target: 「我的士兵战而不疑，死而不惑。」 ～西达将军贾巴力

trans-unit.source: Reverse Damage

trans-unit.source: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个来源，防止此来源下一次在本回合中对你造成的伤害。你获得与以此法所防止的伤害等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Samite Healer
trans-unit.target: 撒姆尼人的医疗员

trans-unit.source: oc T: Prevent the next 1 damage to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：在本回合中对目标生物或牌手防止接下来的1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.
trans-unit.target: 医疗员们终究会得到神赐的健全身心。并且，其中最虔诚的能获赐使他人身体健全的能力。

trans-unit.source: Serenity
trans-unit.target: 清朗

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，消灭所有神器及结界。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "Just think of me as the storm before the calm."\n—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「就把我当成是宁静前的暴风雨吧。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Serra's Blessing
trans-unit.target: 撒拉的祝福

trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap.
trans-unit.target: 你所操控的生物攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes."\n—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator
trans-unit.target: 「我见到天使的双翼庇佑著你的力量，我感到荒野君主造成的废墟盛接著你如雨淌落的悲伤。」 ～晴空号领航员哈娜

trans-unit.source: Spirit Link
trans-unit.target: 心灵羁绊

trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物造成1点伤害，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.target: 常驻军队

trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause Standing Troops to tap.
trans-unit.target: 常驻军队攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.source: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.
trans-unit.target: 拥有的越少，战斗的动力就越多。

trans-unit.source: Staunch Defenders
trans-unit.target: 坚贞的守卫

trans-unit.target: 当坚贞的守卫进场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"\n—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「大家坚守岗位！不想死的就别迟疑！」 ～晴空号的坦格尔斯

trans-unit.target: 日光之网

trans-unit.source: (Walls can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击）

trans-unit.target: 日光之网不可阻挡力量小于或等于2的生物。

trans-unit.source: "There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon."\n—Rashida Scalebane
trans-unit.target: 「天下没有比龙垂死之哀号更美的音乐。」 ～猎鳞者菈希妲

trans-unit.source: Tundra Wolves
trans-unit.target: 苔原狼

trans-unit.source: First strike

trans-unit.source: As the poisoned land spreads, so does the nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.
trans-unit.target: 土地被不断毒害，梦魇的忿怒和力量亦随之增强。

trans-unit.source: Painful Memories
trans-unit.target: 悲苦的回忆

trans-unit.source: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Put that card on top of that player's library.
trans-unit.target: 检视目标对手的手牌，并选择其中一张牌。将此牌置于该牌手的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "It is terrible how one brief action can live forever in memory."\n—Jolrael
trans-unit.target: 「一个简单的小动作居然可以如此深烙于记忆中，真是令人感到恐怖。」 ～裘蕾尔

trans-unit.source: Perish
trans-unit.target: 枯槁

trans-unit.source: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有绿色生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments."\n—Oracle *en*-Vec
trans-unit.target: 「总有一天，土壤和种子都只能吟唱悲歌。」 ～维克族神谕使

trans-unit.source: Pestilence
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫

trans-unit.source: At end of turn, if there are no creatures in play, sacrifice Pestilence. oo B Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: 在回合结束时，如果场上没有生物，则牺牲瘟疫。 oB：瘟疫对每个生物和牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Python
trans-unit.target: 巨蟒

trans-unit.source: "How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?"\n—Hakim, Loreweaver
trans-unit.target: 「众神将蛇的四肢除去，以便让其他生物有逃跑的机会，你怎能说祂们无情？」 ～说书人哈金

trans-unit.source: Rag Man
trans-unit.target: 贫民

trans-unit.source: o Bo Bo B, oc T: Look at target opponent's hand. That player discards a creature card at random from it. Play this ability only during your turn.
trans-unit.target: oBoBoB，ocT：检视目标对手的手牌。该牌手自其中随机弃掉一张生物牌。此异能只能在你的回合中使用。

trans-unit.source: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"
trans-unit.target: 「哈，他只是个愚笨的脏小子，有什么好怕的？」

trans-unit.source: Raise Dead
trans-unit.target: 起死回生

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌自你的坟墓场中移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.
trans-unit.target: 泥土无法留存法术驱使之物。

trans-unit.source: Razortooth Rats
trans-unit.target: 利齿鼠

trans-unit.source: Razortooth Rats can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
trans-unit.target: 利齿鼠只能被神器生物或黑色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「人和鼠都会饿：我们吃我们的玩物，老鼠却吃我们。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Scathe Zombies
trans-unit.target: 枯萎灵俑

trans-unit.source:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"
trans-unit.target: 「它们呻吟、碰撞，站起身来， 口不言语，眼不理睬； 看到死人如此复生， 即使在梦中，还是很奇怪。」 ～山缪·柯利奇，「古代水手的诗歌」

trans-unit.source: Sengir Autocrat
trans-unit.target: 辛格氏独裁者

trans-unit.source: When Sengir Autocrat comes into play, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 当辛格氏独裁者进场时，放置三个0/1，黑色的农奴衍生物进场。

trans-unit.source: When Sengir Autocrat leaves play, remove all Serf tokens from play.
trans-unit.target: 若辛格氏独裁者离场，则将所有农奴衍生物移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: Strands of Night
trans-unit.target: 夜之缕

trans-unit.source: o Bo B, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: oBoB，支付2点生命，牺牲一个沼泽：将目标生物牌自你的坟墓场中放置进场。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「我看到夜晚转成为黑暗的丝带，纺织出比梦境更为阴冷的身影。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Stromgald Cabal
trans-unit.target: 史卓古得的党羽

trans-unit.source: oc T, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.
trans-unit.target: ocT，支付1点生命：反击目标白色咒语。

trans-unit.source: When the alliance between Balduvia and Kjeldor deprived Stromgald of easy victories, its agents were forced to fuel their rituals with their own flesh.
trans-unit.target: 当博都维亚和奇亚德间的同盟使史卓古得不能轻松得胜时，其使者被迫以自己的血肉来支持祭仪。

trans-unit.source: Stupor
trans-unit.target: 精神恍惚

trans-unit.source: Target opponent discards a card at random from his or her hand, then chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手自手上随机弃掉一张牌，然后再自他手上选择并弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness.\n—Suq'Ata saying
trans-unit.target: 除了懒惰之外，所有的病都有药可以医。 ～舒夸塔谚语

trans-unit.source: Syphon Soul
trans-unit.target: 吸魂

trans-unit.source: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
trans-unit.target: 吸魂对每个其他牌手造成2点伤害。你获得等同于以此法造成之伤害数量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Terror
trans-unit.target: 惊骇

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非神器、非黑色的生物。该生物不能重生。

trans-unit.source: Vampiric Tutor
trans-unit.target: 凡派尔导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 自你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets."\n—Shauku, Endbringer
trans-unit.target: 「我用锐利的笔和学生的鲜血在洁白的纸上书写，探知著他们的秘密。」 ～屠戮者刹酷

trans-unit.source: Zombie Master
trans-unit.target: 灵俑王

trans-unit.source: All Zombies gain "oo B Regenerate this creature" and swampwalk. (They're unblockable if defending player controls a swamp.)
trans-unit.target: 所有灵俑获得「oB：重生此生物」以及沼泽行者异能。（如果防御牌手操控任何沼泽，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: He controlled the zombies even before his own death; now nothing can make them betray him.
trans-unit.target: 他在生前即操控著灵俑，如今已没有东西能使它们背叛他了。

trans-unit.source: Aether Flash
trans-unit.target: 乙太闪光

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature comes into play, Æther Flash deals 2 damage to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物进场时，乙太闪光对该生物造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "You can't get there from here. Well, you can—it just won't be fun."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「你不能从这儿过去。嗯，还是可以啦，只是绝不好玩。」 ～法术专家尔泰

trans-unit.source: Anaba Bodyguard
trans-unit.target: 阿那巴保镖

trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.source: "Not all minotaurs are tribal. Some are freelance."\n—Eron the Relentless
trans-unit.target: 「并非所有牛头怪都是部落成员，有些是自由份子。」 ～无情的艾隆

trans-unit.source: Anaba Shaman
trans-unit.target: 阿那巴祭师

trans-unit.source: o R, oc T: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: oR，ocT：阿那巴祭师对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "The shamans? Ha! They are craven cows not capable of true magic."\n—Irini Sengir
trans-unit.target: 「那些祭师？哈！他们只是一群不会正牌法术的胆小鬼。」 ～伊莉妮·辛格

trans-unit.source: Balduvian Barbarians
trans-unit.target: 博都维亚野蛮人

trans-unit.source: "Barbarian raids were a concern to those living in the northwest provinces, but the skyknights never dealt with the problem in a systematic way. They thought of the Balduvians as an 'amusing model' of their forebears' culture."\n—*Kjeldor: Ice Civilization*
trans-unit.target: 「西北方的省分对于蛮族都很忧心，但是空骑士从未计划解决这项问题，他们认为博都维亚只是类似远祖文化的一种『趣味模范』。」 ～奇亚多朗：冰雪文明

trans-unit.source: Balduvian Horde
trans-unit.target: 博都维亚部族

trans-unit.source: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, discard a card at random from your hand. If you don't, sacrifice Balduvian Horde.
trans-unit.target: 当博都维亚部族进场时，从你手牌中随机弃掉一张牌。若你不如此作，则牺牲博都维亚部族。

trans-unit.source: Blaze
trans-unit.target: 焰球

trans-unit.source: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 焰球对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Fire never dies alone.
trans-unit.target: 火焰永不会自己熄灭。

trans-unit.source: Boil
trans-unit.target: 沸腾

trans-unit.source: Destroy all islands.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有海岛。

trans-unit.source: "The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust."\n—Oracle *en*-Vec
trans-unit.target: 「渔夫抛下他们的网，所能捕到的将只有尘土。」 ～维克族神谕使

trans-unit.source: Burrowing
trans-unit.target: 挖掘地道

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains mountainwalk. (It's unblockable if defending player controls a mountain.)
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得山脉行者异能。（若防御牌手操控任何山脉，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: Conquer
trans-unit.target: 占领

trans-unit.source: You control enchanted land.
trans-unit.target: 你获得受此结界之地的操控权。

trans-unit.source: "Why do we trade with those despicable elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them!"\n—Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald
trans-unit.target: 「为什么我们得和那些卑劣的地精交涉？既然你不住在森林，你大可把它给烧了！」 ～史卓古得骑士团团长阿夫拉·盖里森

trans-unit.source: Crimson Hellkite
trans-unit.target: 绯红残虐者

trans-unit.source: Flying o X, oc T: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana this way.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 oX，ocT：绯红残虐者对目标生物造成X点伤害。此异能之费用只能以红色法术力支付。

trans-unit.source: "Dragonfire forged me a warrior."\n—Rashida Scalebane
trans-unit.target: 龙焰将我铸造成战士。 ～猎鳞者菈希妲

trans-unit.source: Earthquake
trans-unit.target: 地震

trans-unit.source: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
trans-unit.target: 地震对每个不具飞行异能的生物和每个牌手造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Fervor
trans-unit.target: 群情激昂

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control gain haste. (They may attack and oc T the turn they come under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 你所操控的生物获得敏捷异能。（你操控这些生物的该回合中，它们便可以攻击以及ocT）

trans-unit.source: "If your blood doesn't run hot, I will make it run in the sands!"\n—Maraxus of Keld
trans-unit.target: 「如果你的血不够炙热，我就让它往沙里流。」 ～凯尔顿的马拉克瑟斯

trans-unit.source: Final Fortune
trans-unit.target: 最终一搏

trans-unit.source: Take another turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.
trans-unit.target: 你在此回合结束以后，继续进行额外的一回合。在该额外的回合结束时，你便输去此盘游戏。

trans-unit.source: Want all, lose all.\n—Zhalfirin aphorism
trans-unit.target: 欲全拿，必全失。 ～赛费林警语

trans-unit.source: Fire Elemental
trans-unit.target: 火元素

trans-unit.source: Fire elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.
trans-unit.target: 火元素凶残暴虐，他们将烤焦的敌人歼灭吞食。爆风闪耀，呼啸而过，只留下遍地恐怖焦土。

trans-unit.source: Firebreathing
trans-unit.target: 炎息

trans-unit.source: oo R Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: oR：受此结界的生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Magic's only part of it, my friend. Diet does the rest."\n—Suq'Ata trader
trans-unit.target: 「朋友啊，法术只是其中的一部份，其余则是我吃的东西。」 ～舒夸塔商人

trans-unit.source: Fit of Rage
trans-unit.target: 怒不可抑

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+3/+3并获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「愤怒只是一时，悔恨却是永远。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Flame Spirit
trans-unit.target: 火焰仙灵

trans-unit.source: oo R Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: oR：火焰仙灵得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain
trans-unit.target: 「火焰的仙灵即变化之仙灵。」 ～博都维亚酋长，冷眼罗维莎

trans-unit.source: Flashfires
trans-unit.target: 火烧旷野

trans-unit.source: Destroy all plains.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有平原。

trans-unit.source: Giant Strength
trans-unit.target: 能力增强

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: "O! it is excellent / To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous / To use it like a giant."\n—William Shakespeare,\n*Measure for Measure*
trans-unit.target: 「喔！能得到巨人的力量，真是太棒了！但若像巨人一样地使用，就太暴虐了。」 ～威廉·莎士比亚，恶有恶报

trans-unit.source: Goblin Digging Team
trans-unit.target: 精灵挖掘队

trans-unit.source: oc T, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
trans-unit.target: ocT，牺牲精灵挖掘队：消灭目标墙。

trans-unit.source: "From down here we can make the whole wall collapse!"\n"Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"
trans-unit.target: 「我们可以从这下面把整座墙弄倒！」 「喔，是的，老大，但我们怎么出去？」

trans-unit.source: Goblin Elite Infantry
trans-unit.target: 精灵精英步兵

trans-unit.source: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or is blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当精灵精英步兵进行阻挡或被阻挡时，它得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: They talk a good fight.
trans-unit.target: 他们擅长纸上谈兵。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Hero
trans-unit.target: 精灵英雄

trans-unit.source: "When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero—everyone else just has to step back!"\n—Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran
trans-unit.target: 「若你是个精灵，你并不需要向前进便能成为英雄～只要别人都后退就成了！」 ～精灵老兵，比甘·富得洛

trans-unit.source: Goblin King
trans-unit.target: 精灵王

trans-unit.source: All Goblins get +1/+1 and gain mountainwalk. (They're unblockable if defending player controls a mountain.)
trans-unit.target: 所有精灵得+1/+1并获得山脉行者异能。（若防御牌手操控任何山脉，则这些生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . .
trans-unit.target: 为了成为国王，奴斯吉尔对布罗格作了布罗格对乌克富、乌克富对维多、维多对洛尔，以及洛尔对奥罗克…等所作的事。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Recruiter
trans-unit.target: 精灵征兵员

trans-unit.source: When Goblin Recruiter comes into play, search your library for any number of Goblin cards you choose. Reveal those cards, then shuffle your library and put them on top of it in any order you choose.
trans-unit.target: 当精灵征兵员进场时，自你的牌库中搜寻任意数量的精灵牌。展示这些牌，然后洗你的牌库，并将这些牌以任意顺序放置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "Next!"
trans-unit.target: 「下一个！」

trans-unit.source: Goblin Warrens
trans-unit.target: 精灵繁殖地

trans-unit.source: o2o R, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: o2oR，牺牲两个精灵：放置三个1/1，红色的精灵衍生物进场。

trans-unit.source: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late."\n—*Sarpadian Empires*, vol. IV
trans-unit.target: 「精灵繁殖于地下，它们躲过敌人的耳目直到多得藏不下。」 ～撒尔帕汀帝国，卷四

trans-unit.source: Hammer of Bogardan
trans-unit.target: 博卡登之锤

trans-unit.source: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player. o2o Ro Roo R Return Hammer of Bogardan to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep and only if Hammer of Bogardan is in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 博卡登之锤对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。 o2oRoRoR：将博卡登之锤移回你的手上。你只可在你的维持中，且博卡登之锤在你的坟墓场中时使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: Hulking Cyclops
trans-unit.target: 笨拙独眼巨人

trans-unit.source: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
trans-unit.target: 笨拙独眼巨人不可进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.
trans-unit.target: 谁都可以在独眼巨人附近徘徊，可是很少有人能挡它的路。

trans-unit.source: Illicit Auction
trans-unit.target: 非法拍卖

trans-unit.source: Choose target creature. Each player may bid life for control of that creature. You begin the bidding at 0. Proceeding in turn order, each player may top the high bid. The auction ends when the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and gains control of the creature.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标生物。每位牌手可用生命为代价进行喊价，以获得该生物的操控权。你由0开始出价。如此依照顺序进行，每位牌手皆可喊更高的价。若无人再喊更高价，则此程序结束。喊出最高价的牌手失去与最高价相等数量的生命，并获得该生物的操控权。

trans-unit.source: Inferno
trans-unit.target: 炼狱

trans-unit.source: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: 炼狱对每个生物及牌手造成6点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."\n—Jaya Ballard, task mage
trans-unit.target: 「曾有人说破坏没什么巧妙之处。你知道怎么了？他们死啦。」 ～特务巫师雅亚·巴拉德

trans-unit.source: Jokulhaups
trans-unit.target: 大洪水

trans-unit.source: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有神器、生物和地。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."\n—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest
trans-unit.target: 「巨浪吞没了树木、桥梁甚至马匹。我的医疗师们有得忙了。」 ～奇亚多朗祭司哈渥·阿雷森

trans-unit.source: Lightning Blast

trans-unit.target: 豹人战士

trans-unit.source: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.
trans-unit.target: 战狗和猫比较起来实在算不了什么。

trans-unit.source: Pradesh Gypsies
trans-unit.target: 柏悉吉卜赛人

trans-unit.source: o1o G, oc T: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o1oG，ocT：目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "A mysterious people indeed. Their origins are as secret as their traditions."\n—Lord Magnus of Llanowar
trans-unit.target: 「他们的来历就如他们的传统一样令人费解，的确是个神秘的民族。」 ～罗堰领主迈格纳斯

trans-unit.source: Radjan Spirit
trans-unit.target: 毕宿仙灵

trans-unit.source: oc T: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：目标生物失去飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Rampant Growth
trans-unit.target: 徒长

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 自你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将该牌横置进场。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.
trans-unit.target: 瑞斯强迫植物离开地表，就像有人把乳浆挤出起士般。

trans-unit.source: Redwood Treefolk
trans-unit.target: 红杉树妖

trans-unit.source: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.
trans-unit.target: 士兵们砍啊砍，但是神木还是挺立不摇，低著头向他们皱眉头。

trans-unit.source: Regeneration
trans-unit.target: 重生

trans-unit.source: oo G Regenerate enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: oG：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.source: River Boa
trans-unit.target: 河流蟒蛇

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable if defending player controls an island.) oo G Regenerate River Boa.
trans-unit.target: 海岛行者（若防御牌手操控任何海岛，则此生物无法被阻挡） oG：重生河流蟒蛇。

trans-unit.source: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."\n—Afari, *Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「但没有人能在大象主战的鸣叫中，听到小蛇央求和平的细语。」 ～雅法莉，故事集

trans-unit.source: Rowen
trans-unit.target: 二度收成

trans-unit.source: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 展示你每回合所抓的第一张牌。若此牌为基本地，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I've dreamt of a second harvest but fear I will not see it."\n—Asmira, holy avenger
trans-unit.target: 「我曾梦见田地再度收成，但只怕我已看不到了。」 ～神圣复仇者阿兹蜜拉

trans-unit.source: Scaled Wurm
trans-unit.target: 锐鳞亚龙

trans-unit.source: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."\n—*Kjeldor: Ice Civilization*
trans-unit.target: 「于冰雪时代中繁盛一时的亚龙，是所有奇亚德人的灾厄。它们巨大的形体和残暴的本性曾在无数人们的恶梦中出现～冰雪时代环境之恶劣，由此可见一斑。」 ～奇亚德：冰雪文明

trans-unit.source: Shanodin Dryads
trans-unit.target: 撒诺丁树灵

trans-unit.source: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable if defending player controls a forest.)
trans-unit.target: 树林行者（若防御牌手操控任何树林，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: Moving without sound, swift figures pass through branches and undergrowth completely unhindered. One with the trees around them, the dryads of Shanodin Forest are seen only when they wish to be.
trans-unit.target: 无声无息地，敏捷的形影穿过树枝和绿丛，完全无人察觉。身居密林的撒诺丁树灵，只有在想让你看到时，你才可能看的到。

trans-unit.source: Stalking Tiger
trans-unit.target: 潜行之虎

trans-unit.source: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature each combat.
trans-unit.target: 潜行之虎在战斗时不可被一个以上的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.
trans-unit.target: 在杰姆拉丛林，美丽与危险通常没有分别。

trans-unit.source: Stream of Life
trans-unit.target: 生命之源

trans-unit.source: Target player gains X life.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手获得X点生命。

trans-unit.source: Summer Bloom
trans-unit.target: 仲夏之花

trans-unit.source: Play up to three additional lands this turn.
trans-unit.target: 此回合你可额外多使用三张地。

trans-unit.source: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.
trans-unit.target: 盛夏用温暖与生生不息的生命来亲吻世界。

trans-unit.source: Thicket Basilisk
trans-unit.target: 灌木丛蜥怪

trans-unit.source: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当灌木丛蜥怪阻挡任何非墙生物，或被任何非墙生物阻挡，于战斗结束时消灭该生物。

trans-unit.source: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's terrible power.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖青苔的石像散落一地，这就是蜥怪恐怖力量的证明。

trans-unit.source: Trained Armodon
trans-unit.target: 驯使的盾皮象

trans-unit.source: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.
trans-unit.target: 它的大限将至。愿它长得更加粗壮，愿敌人横陈于它的尸骸下。

trans-unit.source: Tranquil Grove
trans-unit.target: 静谧花园

trans-unit.source: o1o Goo G Destroy all other enchantments.
trans-unit.target: 1oGoG：消灭所有其他结界。

trans-unit.source: Tranquility
trans-unit.target: 安宁

trans-unit.source: Destroy all enchantments.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有结界。

trans-unit.source: Uktabi Orangutan
trans-unit.target: 乌克塔比长臂猿

trans-unit.source: When Uktabi Orangutan comes into play, destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 当乌克塔比长臂猿进场时，消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.source: "Is it true that the apes wear furs of gold when they marry?"\n—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool
trans-unit.target: 「猴子结婚时，真的会穿上黄金的毛皮吗？」 ～舒夸塔愚者拉娜

trans-unit.source: Uktabi Wildcats
trans-unit.target: 乌克塔比野猫

trans-unit.source: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of forests you control. o G, Sacrifice a forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.
trans-unit.target: 乌克塔比野猫的力量与防御力等同于你所操控的树林数量。 oG，牺牲一张树林：重生乌克塔比野猫。

trans-unit.source: Unseen Walker
trans-unit.target: 隐身旅人

trans-unit.source: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable if defending player controls a forest.) o1o Goo G Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 树林行者（若防御牌手操控任何树林，则此生物无法被阻挡） o1oGoG：目标生物获得树林行者异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "To pass through the jungle: silence, courtesy, ferocity, as the occasion demands."\n—Kamau, "Proper Passage"
trans-unit.target: 「穿过丛林时，切记安静、礼貌、残暴。这是基本要求。」 ～通行之道，卡茂

trans-unit.source: Untamed Wilds
trans-unit.target: 不驯的荒野

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 自你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地，并将该牌放置进场。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Verduran Enchantress
trans-unit.target: 纽杜云咒术师

trans-unit.source: Whenever you play an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用结界咒语时，你便可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Some say magic was first practiced by women, who have always felt strong ties to the land.
trans-unit.target: 有些人说法术最先是由女性发明的，因为她们与大地总是密不可分。

trans-unit.source: Vitalize
trans-unit.target: 活力化

trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 重置所有你操控的生物。

trans-unit.source: "After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare."\n—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「曾在罗堰法术下苏醒，就再也不会想流连于梦境了。」 ～晴空号的米丽

trans-unit.resname: 6ED·266 | Waiting in the Weeds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Waiting in the Weeds
trans-unit.target: 草丛静待

trans-unit.resname: 6ED·266 | Waiting in the Weeds | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each player counts the untapped forests he or she controls and puts that many 1/1 green Cat creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手计算他所操控之未横置树林的数量，并放置同样多的1/1绿色猫衍生物进场。

trans-unit.resname: 6ED·266 | Waiting in the Weeds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The trees have ears, eyes, and teeth.
trans-unit.target: 树木有耳朵、有眼睛、也有牙齿。

trans-unit.source: Warthog
trans-unit.target: 疣猪

trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable if defending player controls a swamp.)
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者（如果防御牌手操控任何沼泽，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: "Too much work—it takes a long time to break them in, and more than a few recruits."\n—Grebog, goblin swine-rider
trans-unit.target: 「太费事了。要制服它需要很长的时间，比训练新兵更麻烦。」 ～精灵猪骑兵格丽柏

trans-unit.source: Wild Growth
trans-unit.target: 野地丛生

trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, it produces an additional o G.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的地被横置以产生法术力时，该地产生额外的oG。

trans-unit.source: Worldly Tutor
trans-unit.target: 处世导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: 自你的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并展示该牌。将你的牌库洗牌之后，将该牌置于你的牌库顶上。

trans-unit.source: "Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels."\n—Afari, *Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「瞬间，亚赛伯手掌上有个进食的犀牛，脚边有个等待的毒蛇。」 ～雅法莉，故事集

trans-unit.source: Wyluli Wolf
trans-unit.target: 威如力狼

trans-unit.source: oc T: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "When one wolf calls, others follow. Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?"\n—Maimun al-Wyluli, diary
trans-unit.target: 「当一匹狼呼吼时，其他狼便会跟随而来。谁想要对这些以蝎子为食的生物作战呢？」 ～弥穆·欧威如力的日记

trans-unit.source: Aladdin's Ring
trans-unit.target: 阿拉丁戒指

trans-unit.source: o8, oc T: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: o8，ocT：阿拉丁戒指对目标牌手或生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: ". . . The magician drew a ring off his finger . . . , saying: 'It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"\n—*The Arabian Nights*,\nJunior Classics trans.
trans-unit.target: 「…法术师拿下他的戒指…，说道：『只要你服从我，那么这个东西将是对抗一切邪恶的护身符。』」 ～天方夜谭

trans-unit.source: Amber Prison
trans-unit.target: 琥珀牢笼

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step. o4, oc T: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. As long as Amber Prison is tapped, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择在重置步骤中不重置琥珀牢笼。 o4，ocT：横置目标神器、生物或地。只要琥珀牢笼持续被横置，该永久物便不能在其操控者的重置步骤中重置。

trans-unit.source: Ankh of Mishra
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉的神符

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何地进场时，米斯拉的神符对该地的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.
trans-unit.target: 达硌士终于解开了这个谜：这些奇怪的建筑并非用来收藏米斯拉的那些邪恶造物，因为它们本身就是那些造物之一。

trans-unit.source: Ashnod's Altar
trans-unit.target: 阿士诺的祭坛

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：加两点无色法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.
trans-unit.target: 兄弟之战在大地上留下了痕迹，而阿士诺却在那些受过酷刑的生物之血缘中留下了印记。

trans-unit.source: Bottle of Suleiman
trans-unit.target: 苏利南的瓶子

trans-unit.source: o1, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 Djinn artifact creature token into play. That creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: o1，牺牲苏利南的瓶子：掷一个硬币。若你输了此掷，则苏利南的瓶子对你造成5点伤害。若你赢了此掷，则放置一个5/5的巨灵衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为具飞行异能的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Charcoal Diamond
trans-unit.target: 炭黑钻石

trans-unit.source: Charcoal Diamond comes into play tapped. oc T: Add o B to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 炭黑钻石须横置进场。 ocT：加oB到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Crystal Rod
trans-unit.target: 水晶棒

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何牌手使用蓝色咒语时，你可以支付o1。若你如此作，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Cursed Totem
trans-unit.target: 诅咒图腾像

trans-unit.source: Players can't play activated abilities of creatures.
trans-unit.target: 所有牌手不可使用生物之起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: Pass me from soul to soul, / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls.\n—Totem inscription (translated)
trans-unit.target: 「让我在灵魂之间梭巡，／从士兵到牧人，牧人到野兽，野兽到泥土／直到我无所不在。／而后，将这些灵魂都交给我。」 ～雕像𫔔刻（译文）

trans-unit.source: Dancing Scimitar
trans-unit.target: 飞舞的弯刀

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.
trans-unit.target: 这飞刀在对手之间游走，不时地在戳击中加入一些戏耍的旋转，甚至翻了好几个跟斗。

trans-unit.source: Dingus Egg
trans-unit.target: 爆地蛋

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何地由场上置入任何坟墓场时，爆地蛋便对该地的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Disrupting Scepter
trans-unit.target: 扰乱权杖

trans-unit.source: o3, oc T: Target player chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. Play this ability only during your turn.
trans-unit.target: o3，ocT：目标牌手从他的手牌中选择并弃掉一张牌。你只能在你的回合中使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: Dragon Engine
trans-unit.target: 龙形引擎

trans-unit.source: o2: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o2：龙形引擎得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "How is it the legged engines seem so much more alive than their wheeled counterparts? Simply, they were born, not made."\n—Mishra
trans-unit.target: 「这些长著脚的引擎看起来怎么会比那些长轮子的同类更像活的？很简单，它们是被生出来的，不是被造出来的。」 ～米斯拉

trans-unit.source: Dragon Mask
trans-unit.target: 龙面具

trans-unit.source: o3, oc T: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. At end of turn, return that creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: o3，ocT：目标你所操控的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。在回合结束时，将该生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "With no further options, I was forced to don the mask."\n—Rashida Scalebane
trans-unit.target: 「在别无选择之下，我被迫戴上那面具。」 ～猎鳞者菈希妲

trans-unit.source: Fire Diamond

trans-unit.target: 焰红钻石须横置进场。 ocT：加oR到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T: You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT：你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: The fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.
trans-unit.target: 那口泉水已经矗立在镇上的广场好几个世纪了，但是只有鸽子知晓它的秘密。

trans-unit.source: Glasses of Urza
trans-unit.target: 克撒的眼镜

trans-unit.source: oc T: Look at target player's hand.
trans-unit.target: ocT：检视目标牌手的手牌。

trans-unit.source: Grinning Totem
trans-unit.target: 微笑图腾像

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and set that card aside. That player then shuffles his or her library. You may play the card as though it were in your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played the card, put it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT，牺牲微笑图腾像：自目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张牌，并将该牌放在旁边。该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。你可以将该牌视为如同是在你手上一般地使用。在你的下一个维持开始时，若你尚未使用该牌，则将它置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: The Hive
trans-unit.target: 蜂箱

trans-unit.source: o5, oc T: Put a 1/1 Wasp artifact creature token into play. That creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: o5，ocT：放置一个1/1的黄蜂衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为具飞行异能的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.
trans-unit.target: 数不清的利嘴与薄翅，由同一个精神所导引。

trans-unit.source: Iron Star

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a red spell, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何牌手使用红色咒语时，你可以支付o1。若你如此作，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Ivory Cup
trans-unit.target: 象牙杯

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a white spell, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何牌手使用白色咒语时，你可以支付o1。若你如此作，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.target: 巨形翡翠石

trans-unit.source: o1: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to you instead.
trans-unit.target: o1：选择一个伤害来源，当此来源下一次在本回合中将要对目标生物造成伤害时，改为对你造成伤害。

trans-unit.source: Jalum Tome
trans-unit.target: 贾伦的巨著

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT：抓一张牌，然后从你的手牌中选择并弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.
trans-unit.target: 尽管克撒并不十分了解此书上古老符文的含义，但这破旧的圣物已为他带来了不少胜利。

trans-unit.source: Jayemdae Tome
trans-unit.target: 神秘巨著

trans-unit.source: o4, oc T: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o4，ocT：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Lead Golem
trans-unit.target: 铅魔像

trans-unit.source: Whenever Lead Golem attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 每当铅魔像进行攻击时，它在其操控者的下个重置步骤中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: Slow and heavy swings the club.
trans-unit.target: 缓慢而沉重地挥动棍棒。

trans-unit.source: Mana Prism
trans-unit.target: 魔力棱镜

trans-unit.source: oc T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. o1, oc T: Add one mana of a color of your choice to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: ocT：加一点无色法术力到你的法术力池中。 o1，ocT：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Marble Diamond
trans-unit.target: 乳白钻石

trans-unit.source: Marble Diamond comes into play tapped. oc T: Add o W to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 乳白钻石须横置进场。 ocT：加oW到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Meekstone
trans-unit.target: 驯服魔石

trans-unit.source: Each creature with power 3 or greater doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 力量大于或等于3的生物在其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: When the mighty sleep, the lowly prowl.
trans-unit.target: 强者沈睡，弱者四出。

trans-unit.source: Millstone
trans-unit.target: 研磨石轮

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T: Put the top two cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT：将目标牌手牌库顶上的两张牌放置于其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.
trans-unit.target: 那石轮日夜不息的转动，发出可怖的声音，许多法术师都被那种声音逼得发狂。

trans-unit.source: Moss Diamond
trans-unit.target: 苔绿钻石

trans-unit.source: Moss Diamond comes into play tapped. oc T: Add o G to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 苔绿钻石须横置进场。 ocT：加oG到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Mystic Compass
trans-unit.target: 神秘罗盘

trans-unit.source: o1, oc T: Target land is a basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT：目标地成为你所选择之基本地类别直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Obsianus Golem
trans-unit.target: 黑曜石魔像

trans-unit.source: "The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ."\n—"Song of the Artificer"
trans-unit.target: 「足石连接至踝石，踝石连接至腿石…」 ～神器师之歌

trans-unit.source: Ornithopter
trans-unit.target: 扑翼机

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."\n—Urza, in his apprenticeship
trans-unit.target: 「能有机会改良索蓝的原设计是我的荣幸。也许历史会因为我的努力而记下一小笔功劳。」 ～克撒于他的学徒生涯

trans-unit.source: Patagia Golem
trans-unit.target: 翼翅魔像

trans-unit.source: o3: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o3：翼翅魔像获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: It scattered falcons like a lion hunting among jackals.
trans-unit.target: 它使隼群四散惊逃，宛如雄狮于豺狼中狩猎一般。

trans-unit.resname: 6ED·306 | Pentagram of the Ages | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pentagram of the Ages
trans-unit.target: 远古的五星仪

trans-unit.resname: 6ED·306 | Pentagram of the Ages | Card Text
trans-unit.source: o4, oc T: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: o4，ocT：选择一个伤害来源，防止此来源下一次在本回合中对你造成的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: 6ED·306 | Pentagram of the Ages | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word—five ways to avoid harm.
trans-unit.target: 一面镜子、一个盾、一份承诺、一段够远的距离，以及一句亲切的话～这是避免受伤的五种方法。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Vault
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚地窖

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT，牺牲一个生物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."\n—Kaervek
trans-unit.target: 「非瑞克西亚之秘密的代价非常昂贵。你必须以铜与骨，钢与腱来做代偿。」 ～凯雷威克

trans-unit.source: Primal Clay
trans-unit.target: 未塑型的黏土

trans-unit.source: Primal Clay comes into play as your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature; a 2/2 artifact creature with flying; or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature. (Walls can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: 当未塑型的黏土进场时，选择一项～它是一个3/3的神器生物；或者它是一个2/2，具飞行异能的神器生物；或者它是一个1/6，视为墙的神器生物。（墙不能攻击）

trans-unit.source: Rod of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 遗迹棍棒

trans-unit.source: o3, oc T: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: o3，ocT：遗迹棍棒对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Skull Catapult
trans-unit.target: 骷髅投石器

trans-unit.source: o1, oc T, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT，牺牲一个生物：骷髅投石器对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic
trans-unit.target: 「是哪个恶魔竟能设计出这种虐人的器具？」 ～索地威的异教徒，寻宝家索琳

trans-unit.source: Sky Diamond
trans-unit.target: 天蓝钻石

trans-unit.target: 天蓝钻石须横置进场。 ocT：加oU到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Snake Basket
trans-unit.target: 蛇笼

trans-unit.source: o X, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Put X 1/1 green Cobra creature tokens into play. Play this ability only if you're allowed to play a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: oX，牺牲蛇笼：放置X个1/1，绿色的眼镜蛇衍生物进场。你只能在你可使用法术时使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Uh, does anyone have a flute?"\n—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool
trans-unit.target: 「呃，哪位身上有带笛子的？」 ～舒夸塔愚者拉娜

trans-unit.source: Soul Net
trans-unit.target: 亡灵之网

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物由场上被置入任何坟墓场时，你可以支付o1。若你如此作，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Storm Cauldron
trans-unit.target: 风暴鼎镬

trans-unit.source: Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手可以在他的每个回合中多使用一张地。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张地被横置以产生法术力时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Puzzle Box
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力的魔术方块

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player counts the cards in his or her hand, puts them on the bottom of his or her library, and then draws that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手计算其手牌，并将那些牌放置于牌库底部后，重新抓取同等数量的牌。

trans-unit.source: Throne of Bone
trans-unit.target: 骨头御座

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a black spell, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何牌手使用黑色咒语时，你可以支付o1。若你如此作，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Wand of Denial
trans-unit.target: 否定之杖

trans-unit.source: oc T: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: ocT：检视目标牌手之牌库的顶牌。若该牌不是地，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，将该牌置入该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: You'll never miss what you never had.
trans-unit.target: 你永不会错过你未曾得到过的。

trans-unit.source: Wooden Sphere
trans-unit.target: 木制法球

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay o1. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何牌手使用绿色咒语时，你可以支付o1。若你如此作，你便获得1点生命。
